title: An exploratory study of fibre microplastics pollution in different process stages of salt production by solar evaporation in Spain

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): M.M. Cledera-Castro, K. Hueso-Kortekaas, C. Sanchez-Mata, C. Morales-Polo, J. Calzada-Funes, N. Delgado-Mellado, R. Caro-Carretero
